set_your_password_desc: Password will be used for your seed phrase encryption and wallet unlocking. The more complex it is the more secure your wallet will be.
enter_password_here: Enter password here, 6 digits at least
confirm_your_password_desc: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password
buy_crypto_content1:
Buy crypto with fiat. 
After purchasing, the crypto currency you bought will be sent to current account. Fiat on ramp service is provided by
buy_crypto_content2: to check details like available countries or regions, fees and payment method.
send_note: Recipient will receive {{fromToken}} on {{network}} network as {{toToken}}
create_not_success: The current wallet has not been created successfully. Please try again later
value_data_cannot_both: The value and data parameters cannot both be filled in
insufficient_gas_token: Insufficient gas or token assets for trading
verification_need_verify_desc: You haven’t logged in on this browser. Please verify your email to sign in or sign up.
verification_send_email_desc: Please send the following email content for verification.
verification_pop_desc: Crescent implemented DKIM system on-chain to verify email and maintain privacy. So you have to send email to verify the ownership of email account first.
verification_click_auto_generated: Click the button below to log into your email and send an auto-generated email for verification.
verification_haven_not_logged_in: You haven’t logged in on this browser. Please log into your email and send the following email content for verification.
